document.full_text: a tripling of profits by general motors co was marred by incentives to lift car sales, raising doubts about the automaker's ability to maintain momentum since emerging from bankruptcy.
document.title: gm profit soars but price incentives cloud outlook
lines_and_colors: a tripling of profits by general motors co was marred by incentives to lift car sales, raising doubts about the automaker's ability to maintain momentum since emerging from bankruptcy.
